name: Bad Guy: Neighborhood
description:
Bad Guy: Neighborhood is an open world free roam style game. Complete objectives, fight bosses and earn money to unlock unique items and abilities in the store. Encounter special enemies and find hidden secrets as you roam around in a violent and unpredictable neighborhood.

Features


  • 15+ unique weapons and abilities
  • Borderline psychopathic game-play options
  • Objective and task progression system
  • Multiple bosses to fight
  • Time rated mini-games
  • Unknown secrets that unlock super secret things (very secret)
  • Continuous open-world, do whatever you want
  • Customizable NPC amount (more/less chaos)
